TopicTitle: The Dan 15 Kabriolet Rover YES, A KONVERTIBLE!

Articles.Content:
Say Hello To the Dan 15 From North Star Motor Division Kerbins First Konvertible!

Its A Modest 170 Parts and is very prone to rolling over past 14 m/s,

but hey who cares when your cruising down the mun in your Konvertible!

Features Include

  • Science Equipment Dash
  • Power Retractable Roof
  • Power Trunk (press 3 to open)
  • Power Hood (press 4 to open)
  • 4 fuel cell engine (press 1 for igniton. 2 to shut off)
  • Working Brake Lights
  • Enough Lights To Blind An Elephant
  • Seating For Four

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/zzbpqwf7tybzvvj/Dan%2015%20Kabriolet.craft?dl=0
I like it! The CoM is a bit high and therefore it wants to tip over. I suggest you try and build the body out of something else than I-beams.
He could also try hiding a jet engine somewhere to lower the CoM
